data.name: RPGScenery - Ridge Creek Scene
data.detailed_description:
Between the high walls of the canyon, the arid air barely moves, there is no wind here, its almost as if time had stopped. Beyond the rocks, a stream of clear water trickles, carving a narrow bed into the hard stone over millennia. On one side of the creek is a long-uninhabited settlement, and on the other is an abandoned mine entrance, deep in the depths, it may hide treasures and secrets or perhaps your end.

This DLC contains 7 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
